greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Generating function Sum_{n >= 0} a(n)*x^n = Sum_{k>=1} x^(k*(3*k+1)/2)/(1-x^k).
comment: The OEIS contains many very similar sequences, but this one was missing.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) my(N=66, x='x+O('x^N)); concat([0, 0], Vec(sum(k=1, N, x^(k*(3*k+1)/2)/(1-x^k)))) \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Dec 03 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 02 2020
